name: Sales Dashboard
backend_requirements: Sale model: id, date, amount (decimal), category, description
GET /api/sales - return all sales, support date range filter
GET /api/sales/summary - return totals by category and month
Seed with sample data if database is empty
frontend_requirements: Sales table with date, amount, category, description columns
Total sales displayed prominently at top
Simple bar chart showing sales by category (Chart.js or similar)
Date range filter (this month, last month, custom)
